title: Transformations
description: The adventure of the werewolves' lover continues. Elizabeth and Ezra are caught between the suspicions of the pack and the life of the innocent man Elizabeth wants to protect from them. Meanwhile, Ezra has asked her to break the man's strong moral conviction - any way she can. Will their existence together survive?This is part two in a series and contains 9700 words, including graphic descriptions of things like:- Group sex- Female-on-male coercion- Light bondage- Romantic love and sex- Attempted group sexual assault- Fantasy/monster sex- Rough sex(So basically, a fair amount of sex. And also some violence. Now you know!)
author: Dani Williams
